casebody.data:
PARTOLA MANUFACTURING COMPANY, Plaintiff in Error, v. William SCHIELD et al., Individually, etc., Defendant in Error. (Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. January 21, 1924.) No. 178. Hovell, McChesney & Clarkson, of Brooklyn, N. Y. (Sidney A. Clarkson and Albert A. Hovell, both of Brooklyn, N. Y., of counsel), for plaintiff in error. Arnold Lichtig, of New York City (Arnold Lichtig and Herbert'A. Mossier, both of New York City, of counsel), for defendants in error.

Before ROGERS, HOUGH, and MAYER, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed.
